description.value: The clockwork rolls a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] at the start of each of its turns. On a failure, it backfires, dealing [[/r 2d6[fire]]] damage in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15], including to itself (@Check[type:reflex|basic:true|dc:0] save at the standard DC for its level), and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 1} this turn.
